name: Cultist Cultivar
description:
CONTROLS
AD : Move
J : Attack
K / Spacebar : Jump
L : Interact

You are a recently recruited cultist that is assigned to go around on Halloween and recruit members. Once you  do, you may choose to sacrifice them for extra power, or keep them, since your goal is to get as many as possible (there's only two lol).

"If your finished product is not incredibly crappy and you didn't have to scrap 90% of you ideas, you weren't ambitious enough" -me,  justifying the quality of this game.

This was made for Spooktober Jam 2021 as stated like everywhere here. It was also my first real game in Unity (yay!). I will make this a real game later, for now uhh suffer

"I am grateful for this opportunity to learn" or something idk it was a skool assignment. Made in approximately 5 days.
